import { Meta } from '@storybook/blocks'

export const RightArrow = () => <svg
    viewBox="0 0 14 14"
    width="8px"
    height="14px"
    style={{
        marginLeft: '4px',
        display: 'inline-block',
        shapeRendering: 'inherit',
        verticalAlign: 'middle',
        fill: 'currentColor',
        'path fill': 'currentColor'
    }}
>
    <path d="m11.1 7.35-5.5 5.5a.5.5 0 0 1-.7-.7L10.04 7 4.9 1.85a.5.5 0 1 1 .7-.7l5.5 5.5c.2.2.2.5 0 .7Z"/>
</svg>

<Meta title="Providers/Translation"/>

<div className="sb-container">

    <div className="sb-section ">
        # Translator Provider

        <p>
            This provider using for provide translator function to entire project. It contains from 2 parts:
            * **Provider**
            * **Injector**
        </p>
        <p>
            Provider part must be placed in top component of project (like ```App.vue```)
        </p>

        ```
        // Provide config
        const provider = useTranslator();
        provider.setupTranslator($t); // $t - is a function which can translate strings

        ```

        <p>If you need to inject translation to your component, then use this injector</p>

        ```
        // Inject config
        const provider = useTranslator();
        provider.trans; // this is translator function
        ```

    </div>
</div>
